solution_line_template: The total percentage the class needs to get is {total_required_percentage} because {num_students} x {required_average} = <<{num_students}*{required_average}={total_required_percentage}>>{total_required_percentage}
The total percentage the class has absent the one student is <<{total_present_percentage}={total_present_percentage}>>{total_present_percentage}

The lowest the absent student can get and still have a pizza party is 27% because ({total_required_percentage}-{total_present_percentage})x {percent_factor} = <<({total_required_percentage}-{total_present_percentage})*{percent_factor}={lowest_absent_grade}>>{lowest_absent_grade}
